full_threads.body:
Hi Shonagh, 

Thanks for your patience with this task. We have now completed the below. 

Regarding your question about the product brochures, we have added a section in the backend of the website, on the product pages where you can upload them, screenshot attached. 

Let me know how you go?

Hi Heath

They are sku's. So when we type #71650 or 71650 into the search bar, we would expect the Fly Attract to appear as a result of the search.

This wasn't occurring for all the products listed in my previous email.

Shonagh

Shonagh Kelly

Manager Insect Control

Housewares & Lighting

Electronic Insect Control & Indoor/Outdoor Lighting

Hi Shonagh, 

Hope you are well. We have been working through these requests.

For item 1 "Part numbers for bug zapper units are not linked with the products. Below is a list of product codes that need to be listed with the products." - Can I clarify if these numbers are for just the SKU's OR if you would like them added to the end of the product titles, e.g. "Fly Attract Slow Release Fly Lure #71650".

Thank you Heath, the photos look great in a smaller aspect, however there are a number that are still missing? Would you know if they are still being download? There are a number of other changes I would like to implement across the website in addition to some missing information. I have listed them all below.
  1. Part numbers for bug zapper units are not linked with the products. Below is a list of product codes that need to be listed with the products.
ELECTRAZAP 71505 STINGER 20W 71369 STINGER 40W 71384 STINGER SOLAR BUG ZAPPER 71715 STINGER INSECT CONTROL STN 71968 STINGER ICS REFILL KIT 71962 STINGER BUG SENTINEL 71985 STINGER RECHARGEABLE 71982 YARD GUARD 30W 71530 YARD GUARD 50W 71550 YARD GUARD MOSQUITO TRAP 71390 YARD GUARD BUG VAC 71800 BUG DESTROYER 71345 MOZZIE ATTACK PLUS 71355 ADVENTURIDGE BUG ZAPPER 63258-20 COOLABAH BUG ZAPPER 30W 11109 COOLABAH BUG ZAPPER 20W 40185 SECTARID SR20C 71291 SECTARID SR20SS 71289 SECTARID SR40A 71285 SECTARID SR40SS 71287 SECTAZAP 40 71280 SR20 DÉCOR 71290 SR20 LURALITE 71294 SR20 DESIGN 71292 FLY TRAP 71271 FT40 GLUE BOARDS 71274 MOZZIE ATTRACT LURE 71620 FLY ATTRACT LURE 71650 LURALITE GLUEBOARDS 71268 DESIGN GLUEBOARDS 71266 DÉCOR GLUEBOARDS 71267
  1. CHANGE PRODUCT CATAGORIES
On the side margin on the home page there appears to be a lot of duplicate categories. Is it possible to reduce what is currently on the side margin to the brads
  • STINGER
  • ELECTRAZAP
  • YARD GUARD
  • MOZZIE ATTACK PLUS
  • SECTA RID
  • COOLABAH
  • ADVENTURIDGE
  • OTHERS
Then under each category you would have links to the correct brands STINGER Bug zapper item number Globe item number STINGER 20W 71369 71469 71470 STINGER 26W 71467 STINGER 40W 71384 71468 71488 STINGER SOLAR BUG ZAPPER 71715 No bulb STINGER INSECT CONTROL STN 71968 71462 STINGER ICS REFILL KIT 71962 No bulb STINGER BUG SENTINEL 71985 71462 STINGER RECHARGEABLE 71982 New globe yet to be ad YARD GUARD Bug zapper item number Globe item number YARD GUARD 20W NONE 71475 YARD GUARD 30W 71530 71455 71480 YARD GUARD 40W NONE 71479 YARD GUARD 50W 71550 71460 71481 YARD GUARD MOSQUITO TRAP 71390 71485 YARD GUARD BUG VAC 71800 71450 ELECTRAZAP ELECTRAZAP 71505 71469 71470 MOZZIE ATTACK PLUS MOZZIE ATTACK PLUS 71355 71452 COOLABAH COOLABAH BUG ZAPPER 30W 11109 71455 COOLABAH BUG ZAPPER 20W 40185 71469 ADVENTURIDGE ADVENTURIDGE BUG ZAPPER 63258 71462 SECTARID Product item number Globe item number Glue board item number SECTARID SR20C 71291 71104 NA SECTARID SR20SS 71289 71104 NA SECTARID SR40A 71285 71110 NA SECTARID SR40SS 71287 71110 NA SECTAZAP 40 71280 71110 NA SR20 DÉCOR 71290 71469-G 71267 SR20 LURALITE 71294 71469-G 71268 SR20 DESIGN 71292 71469-G 71266 FLY TRAP 71271 71109 71274 OTHERS BUG DESTROYER 71345 71465
  1. In the BUY BUG ZAPPERS tab I only want the items that can be purchased, not the out of stock items. All of the out of stock items only need to be included in the globes section.
ELECTRAZAP P 20W 71505 71469 71470 STINGER 20W 71369 71469 71470 STINGER 40W 71384 71468 71488 STINGER ICS REFILL KIT 71962 No bulb STINGER BUG SENTINEL 71985 71462 YARD GUARD 30W 71530 71455 71480 YARD GUARD 50W 71550 71460 71481 YARD GUARD MOSQUITO TRAP 71390 71485 SECTARID SR20C 71291 71104 SECTARID SR20SS 71289 71104 SECTARID SR40A 71285 71110 SECTARID SR40SS 71287 71110 SECTAZAP 40 71280 71110 SR20 DÉCOR 71290 71469-G 71267 SR20 LURALITE 71294 71469-G 71268 SR20 DESIGN 71292 71469-G 71266 FLY TRAP 71271 71109 71274
  1. If I want to add sales brochures/ information to the website, would you be able to create a tab under the helpful info that I can upload them to?
I understand this is a bit or work, but I think it will make the site run a lot of efficiently. Let me know if I can be of any more assistance or call me on 02 8811 3710 if you wish to discuss. Shonagh Shonagh Kelly Manager Insect Control Housewares & Lighting 2 Bonz Place Seven Hills Sydney NSW 2147 Australia PO Box 516 Blacktown Sydney NSW 2148 Australia T: 61 2 8811 3710 F:61 2 8811 3799 shonagh@kellycompany.com.au Electronic Insect Control & Indoor/Outdoor Lighting

Hi Shonagh, 

Further to my email yesterday, confirming we have now updated all of the images for you. 

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

full_threads.body:
Hi Shonagh, 

Just an update for you. We are having to export, edit and re-upload the images in a more standard format to make this work for you. We are about half way through them and will complete the balance of them tomorrow. 

We will send you and email once they are all completed.
@manuel yes, that's correct on that page. It looks like the images are being cropped?
@heath does it mean this under categories https://bugzapperlamps.com.au/product-category/buy-bug-zappers/ ?

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath

On our bug zapper lamps website, I was wondering if we can reduce the size of some of the images under the “buy” bug zapper tab? Also can we reduce the description?
It looks funny seeing only a part of the bug zapper, and the descriptions are too long as headers for the image. We can get rid of the with energy saving globe- as that is all we are selling the new units with.


Shonagh
